attributes.title: SIMPLE TIPS TO BUILD CONSCIOUS STAMINA  |12 JULY 2021|
attributes.description:
12 JUL 2021, MONDAY (IST) - ENGLISH NITHYANANDA SATSANG GIST

10:10 PM - THE SPH DARSHAN
SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM (SPH), JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM (JGM), HIS DIVINE HOLINESS (HDH) BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM.  
10:15 PM - 11:42 PM - NITHYANANDA SATSANG
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*PHYSICS OF CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS ALL ABOUT BUILDING THE BODY WITH SPIRITUAL STAMINA TO HOLD THE CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY AND RADIATE THE CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
*I AM JUST FILLED WITH PARAMASHIVA SPACE. 
*THE ME I AM EXPERIENCING IN ME IS THE COSMIC ME, THE PARAMASHIVA.
*AND I ALSO KNOW, THE ME YOU ARE EXPERIENCING IN YOU RIGHT NOW IS ALSO PART OF THAT PARAMASHIVA’S ME - COSMIC ME.
*WITH THIS DEEP LOVE OF ONENESS, YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA, I AM PARAMASHIVA, WE BOTH PUT TOGETHER ARE PART OF PARAMASHIVA.
READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/358043025688535
